title: PENTHOUSE / OPEN VIEWS / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / HIGH CEILINGS / FITNESS CEN
posting_body: ['PENTHOUSE / OPEN VIEWS / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / HIGH CEILINGS / FITNESS CENTER / PARKING / ROOF DECK', 'Listing ID #: 212629', 'Price: $8,795', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,200 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Laundry', 'Subway', 'This MASSIVE luxury residence puts you in the center of an all-encompassing lifestyle.', 'You will be WOWED at every turn.', "Peace and serenity await you while the excitement of the all the city has to offer is just a stone's throw away!", 'Walk your dog along the waterfront and enjoy the sound of the ocean, or jog around the neighborhood and stop by one the iconic eateries!', 'Video tour available.', 'This impressive building dominates the predominantly low-rise West Village area, commanding stunning views in all directions.', 'Enjoy the convenience of an on-site grocer, fitness center and parking, plus glorious river and city views from a rooftop garden.', 'Come and live in the West Village’s most prestigious rental residence.', 'Located in the historic West Village, you are surrounded by cobblestone streets, landmark buildings, hidden square and ivy covered facades.', 'The premier location includes easy access to galleries, cafes, great eateries and boutiques.', 'Come live in this historic area where art and culture are in abundance!', 'For showings contact:', 'Adel Talebpour / The Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
